title: Another Year of Wonder
content:
Another candle on your cake,
Another wish for you to make,
May all your dreams come true today,
And joy follow you in every way.

You're growing wiser, growing strong,
Your laughter is life's sweetest song,
Here's to the memories we'll create,
And all the adventures that await!

title: Birthday Blessings
content:
On this special day of yours,
We celebrate what life ensuresâ€”
That friendship, love, and laughter bright
Will fill your heart with pure delight.

May sunshine dance upon your face,
And happiness fill every space,
With each new day that comes your way,
May magic find you every day!

title: Wishes for You
content:
Birthdays are nature's way of telling us
To eat more cake and make more fuss!
So here's to you on this special day,
May all your troubles melt away.

Like flowers bloom in morning light,
May your future be just as bright,
With love and laughter, joy and cheer,
Happy Birthday! Have a wonderful year!
